subject: Free Agents (Sports)
Basketball
Wages and Salaries
lead_paragraph: The Washington Wizards bought out the contract of center Zydrunas Ilgauskas and waived him, creating the possibility of an eventual return to the Cleveland Cavaliers.
snippet: The Washington Wizards bought out the contract of center Zydrunas Ilgauskas and waived him, creating the possibility of an eventual return to the Cleveland Cavaliers.
